messages.title: Why a Change of Government matters in Richmond and Kingston
messages.content: A change of Government will have a direct impact on Richmond Park and North Kingston. Only the Conservatives can stop the Third Runway.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Conservative NHS policies will safeguard Kingston Hospital.
School is a priority. Zac wants to make it easier to set up and expand local schools for local children.
Conservatives will slash red tape and get more police on the streets.
No ifs, no buts. Under a Conservative Government there will be no 3rd runway at Heathrow.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Locally, the choice is between an independent-minded candidate with a record of action and influence, and an independent-minded candidate who consistently puts party policy before the community. MP.

issues.environment: Zac has fought countless campaigns against inappropriate development in the area. 50 victories at Garden Court. Protects 'vulnerable' garden boundaries against a 'green grab'.
issues.health: NHS policies will safeguard Kingston Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: Zac Goldsmith is your Independent Voice, Richmond and North Kingston's Team Champion.

politicalExperience.role: Independent Voice for Richmond and North Kingston
politicalExperience.achievements: Zac has fought countless campaigns against inappropriate development in the area. 50 victories at Garden Court; protects 'vulnerable' garden boundaries against a 'green grab'.

images.caption: Zac against the expansion of Heathrow

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet outlines Zac Goldsmith's priorities and stance on local issues such as protecting Kingston Hospital, opposing the Third Runway at Heathrow, and supporting the establishment and expansion of local schools. It emphasizes his actions against inappropriate development and positions him as an independent-minded candidate.
